column1: Family will receive friends starting at 8:00am and Funeral Service will begin at 10:00am Saturday June 13
column2: 2015 at Southfield Community Baptist Church 1399 Augmont Ave.  Interment with Military Honors at Green Lawn Cemetery.  Ministry of Comfort entrusted to MARLAN J. GARY FUNERAL HOME
column3: THE CHAPEL OF PEACE 2500 Cleveland Ave.
